original_text: And they that escape of you shall remember me among the nations whither they shall be carried captives, because I am broken with their whorish heart, which hath departed from me, and with their eyes, which go a whoring after their idols: and they shall lothe themselves for the evils which they have committed in all their abominations.
korean_text: 너희 중에서 살아 남은 자가 사로잡혀 이방인들 중에 있어서 나를 기억하되 그들이 음란한 마음으로 나를 떠나고 음란한 눈으로 우상을 섬겨 나를 근심하게 한 것을 기억하고 스스로 한탄하리니 이는 그 모든 가증한 일로 악을 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And they that escape of you
shall remember me among the nations
whither they shall be carried captives
because I am broken with their whorish heart
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내가 그들의 음란한 마음으로 인해 상하였음이라

sentences.original_text: which go a whoring after their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그 눈은 그들의 우상을 따라 행음하니

sentences.original_text: for the evils which they have committed
